definitions.definition: To engage in a raid against.
examples: The police raided the gambling den.
The soldiers raided the village and burned it down.
A group of mobsters raided an art museum and stole a bunch of paintings.
Someone has been banned from Discord for raiding a server.

definitions.definition: To lure from another; to entice away from.
To indulge oneself by taking from.
examples: I raided the fridge for snacks.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To engage in a raid against.
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To lure from another; to entice away from.
( transitive ) To indulge oneself by taking from.
